comments.author: Salim Khan
comments.content: Are we going anywhere this season or are we just going to look at old pictures??????

comments.author: KO
comments.content: Salman says that by the time your jeep is fixed we should be well on our way somewhere. Another msg. from an un-named offroader is that once you organize a trip we’ll go!

comments.author: salim Khan
comments.content:
Its too hot to go anywhere, weather as well as prevalent atmosphere…..so i guess in November atleast the weather would be good….some new scenery would be appreciated so i think the Run of Kuttch and the Thar Desert would be a great place to spend a few nights.

What is everyone’s opinion?????? Some thoughts Please?

Salim

comments.author: Jaffar
comments.content: It was very pleasing to see such a beautiful site. These things are to be shown, especially on the net so that we might comfort our eyes by the very nature of beauty after exhausting from our life in the desert like areas of the remaining country.

comments.author: Aamir Bilal Sheikh
comments.content: The photographs clearly speak that some super power is controling this universe.

comments.author: TALAS
comments.content: What ever you guys do, please remember to let every body knows not to leave any plastic bag behind in the park as it will take many years to decompose and would destroy the habitat.
